website_summaries.verdict: Norton Security and Antivirus offers lab-tested antivirus protection, along with excellent phishing protection and robust anti-theft tools for your Android.
pros: Outstanding malware protection in independent lab tests
Privacy warnings integrated into Google Play
Full slate of anti-theft tools, including SMS commands
cons: Doesn't automatically screen unknown phone numbers

customer_reviews.title: Prompt Action by Norton
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's fine. The set-up is different and I noted that Norton were automatically doing quick scans for me. I thought this would continue. However, I received a scam telephone call, supposedly from Norton, asking if I had downloaded files as my computer was infected. The call was from "Kelvin" of Canterbury, London; I knew then that the call was rubbish. On further looking at the set-up of Norton, I have found out how to scan the computer myself. When I did this after the above call, I found that I had in fact a corrupted file on my computer which Norton deleted for me. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Super Trouper

customer_reviews.title: Lost Days
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Norton with 25 days remaining of my previous product remaining, thinking the days would be added on to my 12 months subscription. But having keyed in my new product key and updated this, I see even one week later its not the case. Lost 25 days,as I thought they would be added on, and I dont know how to make it right.Any body help ? So I will not do this again. Renew on the day of expiry is my advice. Also, I see that this is a starter addition, and that some windows 8 protection are not included ? Any way its OK, but some how I have the feeling that I may change product next year.
customer_reviews.author: Ian K

customer_reviews.title: Love this product always bought for my dad at Xmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product always bought for my dad at Xmas as he wont use anything else ("why go else where if I'm happy with the product" fair comment I say), because I trust my dads knowledge (he is my dad after all!!) I too have started buying this product to protect my own devices and I have to say I can see why he doesn't need to change to anyone else. Gives me all the protection I need. I also love that it reminds you when you need to update it which instructions are easy to follow and gives you peace of mind until the next update/upgrade. Would definitely recommend to family and friends x
customer_reviews.author: madsam

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! I contacted Norton as 360 is being discontinued and being replaced with Norton Security, hence I opted for this to be more up to date. I have had no problems installing this and it runs very smoothly and easily. If you liked 360, this is not much different really. It looks a little different, but principle is the same. As long as it protects, that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mercury

customer_reviews.title: jugeling with the Norton Security code.
customer_reviews.text: I expected a CD to install the new Norton to my computer. What a surprise to find that I had paid £30.00 for a bit of paper with a new product No. After a bit of searching and mouse jugeling on the lap top, I eventualy managed to put it on the computer after about an hour. I am by no means an IT expert, but I did find it a bit difficult to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Dougal

customer_reviews.title: Check what you are buying!
customer_reviews.text: Please read description VERY carefully, all of it as this is a download product only, all you get is a printed code on a card. Therefore packaging is totally excessive, even the frustration- free packaging was too much and I still had to resort to a pair of scissors to open the sealed Norton envelope inside. Norton itself is an excellent product and does what it says very well without any fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Nottingham Lady

customer_reviews.title: Waste of packaging
customer_reviews.text: It was very disappointing. I had assumed that it would be a disk. What on earth is the point of sending packaging for a slip of paper? The description does not make it clear. Also, despite having used Norton before, it did not load properly and had to be reloaded. It was only the notices saying the previous Norton was about to run out which alerted me to the fact the new one had not loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Quercus

customer_reviews.title: A straightforward way to upgrade to new version.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had Norton 360 and thought that I could just use this product code to renew my cover, it transpires that you do have to download a completely different version but it was quite simple and it automatically removed the previous product during installation, so all is well !
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous years
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as previous years. Didn't like using a "key" rather than a disc. Has several hiccups with this.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Pam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to download and install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to download and install. Have used Norton security for years and been very satisfied with protection it provided. My main gripe is the renewal subscription they charge if you "auto renew". It is far cheaper if you buy and install a fresh Norton product.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Eales

customer_reviews.title: Next time I'll get the CD
customer_reviews.text: Worked in the end but had to restart computer three times. Next time I'll make sure I have the CD version. Please note that I'm not blaming the supplier but the instructions from Norton on how to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Hughie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Latest Norton Security 2015
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Norton over the years and found them very reliable which gives me confidence in my financial transactions. This latest version is simpler and user friendly. The installation is from the product key supplied and not a CD. I do not envisage moving to another security supplier and recommend this product.

product_meta.title: Norton Security 2.0, 1 User - 10 Devices, 25GB, 12 Month [Online Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Online Code| Edition:10 Device, 1 Year (incl. backup)

The new Norton Security with Backup delivers the best of Norton for your family of devices. Just one simple subscription helps protect your PCs, Macs, smartphones and tablets, and even backs up the personal files, photos, videos and other memories on your PC. With Norton Security with Backup, you can be safe online with the many ways you connect. It’s the one solution to help keep the devices underneath your roof safe.

System Requirements:  * Supported OS: Windows 8 Windows Vista Windows XP Mac OS X
 * Additional Requirements: Internet connection required and high speed Internet connection recommended
feature_bullets: Get Norton protection regardless of how your family connects
Easily secure your family of PCs, Macs, smartphones and tablets
Automatically back up precious photos and movies from your PC
Mix and match protection for your devices in a snap
Find and secure a lost smartphone or tablet for added peace of mind
